message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, so I'm proposing a 55/45 split. Let's close this deal and avoid further losses from inflation.
Considering the inflation, my new offer is slightly lower, but still more than fair. 58-42 is the best I can do.
Alice, let's be realistic. The value is decreasing every round. I'm proposing 60/40 - a strong offer considering the circumstances.  Take it now before it shrinks further.
I understand we both want the best deal, but I won't go below 56-44. Inflation is affecting us both, let's settle this.
